Liverpool want around £15 million for Daniel Sturridge this summer with Fenerbahce among the interested parties in the striker, writes @_pauljoyce

Fenerbahce, the Turkish side, have registered an interest in Sturridge and long-term suitors Seville remain in the background. The fee would be manageable for the Spanish club but it remains to be seen whether they could afford his wages of £100,000 a week as well. (Paul Joyce)

Fenerbahce — whose new sporting director is Damien Comolli, the former Liverpool director of football — would be able to meet both payments. But Sturridge may not regard Turkey as the right platform for the next stage of his career. (Paul Joyce)

Other departures over the course of the summer are likely to include Simon Mignolet, Danny Ings, who has been tracked by Crystal Palace for much of the past year, and the youngster Ryan Kent. (Paul Joyce)

【Let's celebrate】

文尼大讚費明奴！

「佢非常勤力兼好波到令人難以置信，佢落到場一眼關七，努力不懈為球隊防守，但實情佢係一個前鋒球員，所以佢簡直係與別不同，對球隊非常非常非常重要。」

「費明奴係一個娛樂家，佢好鍾意跳舞，又迫我陪佢一齊癲！我好努力嘗試，但始終無佢跳得咁好，佢成日問我『做乜唔一齊跳呀，之前唔係講好咗嫁咩？！』，我就會答佢『我紅都面晒呀！我無你跳得咁好呢！』，然後佢就會話『舉高隻手，使乜怕醜，一起森巴舞撥走不滿，發洩發洩你苦悶！』。然後我地就享受自己！」

https://www.liverpoolfc.com/news/first-team/304613-sadio-mane-roberto-firmino-celebrations-liverpool-fc
